name: empoweryou-backend
description: Backend server for EmpowerYou contact form

scripts.test: node -e "require('http').get('http://localhost:3000/api/health', (r) => { let d = ''; r.on('data', c => d += c); r.on('end', () => console.log(d)); }).on('error', e => console.error('Server not running:', e.message));"
